name: Md Amaan Khan
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

certifications.title: Data Analytics and Visualization Virtual Experience

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: DSW (Dean Student Welfare) Website for College
projects.description: Created user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on student resources like club details, upcoming events, event announcements and management, and feedback forms. Improved website performance through code optimization, compatibility and fast loading times. Worked closely with team members, participating in regular meetings and utilizing Git for version control to manage and synchronize code changes efficiently.

projects.name: Emotion behind the screen: Analyzing sentiment student review of online course
projects.description: Developed and implemented a sentiment analysis model using keras, tensorflow, NLP to categorize student feedback from online courses into positive, negative, and neutral sentiments. Utilized natural language processing (NLP) techniques to extract emotional insights and identify key themes within the textdata. Designed data visualizations to effectively communicate findings and trends in student satisfaction, highlighting areas for improvement in course design and delivery.

experiences.description: Completed online courses in web development, focusing on technologies such as frontend and database. Developed multiple web projects using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance user experience and interface design.

Designed and developed responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and backend support to ensure a seamless user experience across different devices and browsers. Applied theoretical knowledge from my coursework in real-world projects, bridging the gap between academic learning and practical application. Gained hands-on experience with web development tools and frameworks, enhancing my technical skills.
